line_1: But the strong Shield their Points at distance holds,
line_2: Where two fair Eagles spread their Wings in Gold;

line_1: And all the air a solemn stillness holds,
line_2: And drowsy tinklings lull the distant folds;

line_1: Racking the Pain, but firm the Serpent holds,
line_2: And hides the Urchin in his mazy Folds.
Which the page of love unfolds;

line_1: Within her hand a vacant string she holds,
line_2: The blotted scroll the other hand unfolds,

line_1: Her left a magic mirror holds,
line_2: In which she oft herself beholds.

line_1: And all the air a solemn stillness holds,
line_2: And drowsy tinklings lull the distant folds;
No beauty in the scaly folds,

line_1: Their gasping throats with clenching hands he holds;
line_2: And Death untwists their convoluted folds.

line_1: Where with vast convolution DRACO holds
line_2: The ecliptic axis in his scaly folds,

line_1: Close 'till the Morn, her humid Veil she holds;
line_2: Then deckt with Virgin Pomp the Flow'r unsolds.

line_1: Her tresses a blue riband holds,
line_2: Soft white the well turn'd limbs enfolds;

line_1: Where the clear stream its useful tenor holds,
line_2: And the shorn flocks come whiten'd from the folds;
Than the first glance, perhaps, unfolds;

line_1: A clasp of icy diamonds holds;
